name: Rykerbot-dev
body:
RYKERbot
---------

A small 2-wheeled robot designed and built by my son Ryker and I.

Main processor - 8051
Wireless Communicatoin with X-Bee pro
c++ program to control the robot from a Windows machine


This will get updated later with better info.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
